title: General
fullText:
This Section provides requirements for detailed visual inspection and limited testing of an electrical installation to assess that the installation is in good repair/working order and does not show signs of misuse or damage and passes the limited testing requirements.
This assessment is intended to limit the need for disconnection of supply to the installation and the need to access live parts.
Dismantling or removal of equipment is not required, except when assessing switchboards.
In accordance with Clause 2.5.3, the requirements of this Section are in addition to the requirements of Section 3.
NOTE An inspection and test may be required to be performed and reported in a specific manner by legislation.
